EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Software: The Time for Digital Transformation is Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With PGConf 2016 behind us, now is the time to put Postgres and Pivotal Greenplum to work to accelerate your digital transformation. It doesn’t matter what industry you’re in–your enterprise has the opportunity to use software, data and analytics to redefine its relationship with customers to develop completely new business models and drive new levels of profitability and efficiency.
To find out how Pivotal can help you on this journey, please join us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PGConfQ216]]>, August 1–4. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services. Whether you are just starting your transformation journey or already delivering at scale, there will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data analytics, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more. Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PGConfQ216]]>.
We also invite you to take advantage of our library of Big Data and Digital Transformation resources, including:
- Case Study: Aridhia Powers Next-Gen Clinical Analytics Platform with Pivotal Greenplum
- TDWI eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing Through Open Source Software
- IDC White Paper: Toward Actionable Information - Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PGConfQ216]]>
- On-Demand Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016 <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PGConfQ216]]>
Now is the time to take the reins of your Digital Transformation. Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
